about_the_game:
Bouncing Over It is a precision platformer that puts you in control of the legendary Monkey King's staff as you navigate through a series of increasingly challenging obstacles to reach the summit of a single, daunting level.

Design Philosophy
Inspired by the genre’s ability to provoke a unique mix of frustration and satisfaction, we delved into precision platformers to design a game that’s both engaging and unpredictable. Our core mechanic revolves around physics-based movement, ensuring that each action taken by the player is both deliberate and potentially surprising, with outcomes that can either aid or hinder progress.

Gameplay
Bouncing Over It features a single continuous level where players start at the bottom and must skillfully ascend to the top. The journey is fraught with precarious sections that can cause a misstep and send you tumbling down. However, falling doesn't mean game over – it simply means you have to find your way back up from where you fell.

Controls
  • Movement The staff moves by bouncing off surfaces. The force of the bounce depends on where the staff makes contact.
  • Control The staff’s head follows the mouse cursor, determining the direction of its movements.
  • Boost To gain a boost, you need to spin the staff five times to charge it. The staff will light up when charged, and you can activate the boost with a left-click in the opposite direction of where you want to go.

Why You'll Love It
If you enjoy games like Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy, you'll find a kindred spirit in Bouncing Over It. The challenging yet rewarding gameplay is designed for those who appreciate the blend of skill, patience, and a touch of frustration. Are you ready to master the staff and conquer the mountain? The summit awaits.

name: Bouncing Over It

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Bouncing Over It is a precision platformer where you control the Monkey King's staff to reach the summit. Navigate obstacles with physics-based movement using the mouse. Each fall is a new challenge, climb back up and try again. Test your skill, patience, and perseverance in this game.
